producer.description: Name of the script/application that generated the report

timestamp.description: Application execution completion time in ISO8601 format

message.description: Human-readable message about the execution result

artifacts.description: Artifacts produced by the application. Keys correspond to names declared in the 'produces' section.

additionalProperties.description: List of file paths, URLs, or other outputs

metrics.description: Additional execution metrics (optional). Keys are metric names, values are numeric.
